detail_desc: Slippers in supersoft faux fur with patterned soles.
Hoop earrings in metal decorated with stone-like plastic beads, sparkly glass stones and metal beads. Diameter 5 cm.
Hoop earrings in metal decorated with stone-like plastic beads, sparkly glass stones and metal beads. Diameter 5 cm.
Blouse in a crisp weave with gathered seams at the front, back and sides. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip in one side and long puff sleeves. Unlined.
Blouse in a crisp weave with gathered seams at the front, back and sides. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip in one side and long puff sleeves. Unlined.
Blouse in a crisp weave with gathered seams at the front, back and sides. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip in one side and long puff sleeves. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in airy cotton poplin with a smocked, stand-up collar with hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck, a concealed zip at the back and long, voluminous balloon sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.

Short dress in cotton denim with a mandarin collar, V-shaped yoke front and back and a concealed zip at the front. Chest and front pockets, an elasticated seam at the waist and long, wide sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.

Blouse in twill made from a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a grandad collar, pearly buttons down the front and a tapered waist. Lightly padded shoulders, long balloon sleeves with pleats at the shoulders for added width, and wide, buttoned cuffs.

Long dress in a nylon rustle weave with a concealed zip at the back. Short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs and covered buttons, a yoke at the top and a gathered seam above the hem for added width. Unlined.
Metal hoop earrings. One smooth pair, one pair decorated with sparkly stones and one pair decorated with different-coloured plastic beads. Diameter 1.5 cm and 2 cm.
Sleep mask in soft faux fur with appliqués and a satin backing. Narrow elastic strap at the back. Width 18 cm.
Short skirt in washed cotton denim. High waist with wide elastication at the back, a zip fly and button, and flap patch pockets at the sides.
Flared, knee-length skirt in cotton satin. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a small frill trim, a detachable, braided belt and a large flap patch pocket on each side. Unlined.

5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, button fly and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim – a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Ankle-length skirt in a cotton and modal weave with a concealed zip in one side. High waist with covered elastication and a detachable belt with a covered buckle. Two slits at the front. Lined with a short skirt in woven fabric.

Cargo trousers in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side, back and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud. Zip fly and press-stud and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and an elasticated drawstring at the hems.

Cargo trousers in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side, back and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud. Zip fly and press-stud and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and an elasticated drawstring at the hems.

Cargo trousers in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side, back and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud. Zip fly and press-stud and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and an elasticated drawstring at the hems.
Long, high-waisted skirt in a viscose weave with covered elastication at the waist and gathered seams creating tiers at the thighs and knees for added width. Unlined.
Long, high-waisted skirt in a viscose weave with covered elastication at the waist and gathered seams creating tiers at the thighs and knees for added width. Unlined.
Long, high-waisted skirt in a viscose weave with covered elastication at the waist and gathered seams creating tiers at the thighs and knees for added width. Unlined.
Long, high-waisted skirt in a viscose weave with covered elastication at the waist and gathered seams creating tiers at the thighs and knees for added width. Unlined.
Fully-fashioned trainers with an imitation leather heel cap. Mesh insoles and textured soles.
Fully-fashioned trainers with an imitation leather heel cap. Mesh insoles and textured soles.
Glittery leggings in stretch, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Glittery leggings in stretch, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Loose-fitting blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck at the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats, a small opening and ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Loose-fitting blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck at the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats, a small opening and ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Blouse in airy, slub-weave cotton with contrasting colour embroidery around the neckline and on the sleeves. V-shaped opening at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Poncho in a soft, fine-knit wool and cashmere blend with a draped collar and a ribbed trim along one side.
Pyjamas with a top in cotton jersey and shorts in a viscose weave. Top with a text print on the front and short sleeves. Shorts with an all-over print and an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless dress in soft, crinkled jersey with a tie detail at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in soft, crinkled jersey with a tie detail at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sandals in imitation suede with covered block heels, crossover foot straps and long straps that tie around the ankles. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Sandals in imitation suede with covered block heels, crossover foot straps and long straps that tie around the ankles. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with flounces. Adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a metal fastener at the back.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with flounces. Adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a metal fastener at the back.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with flounces. Adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a metal fastener at the back.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with flounces at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with flounces at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with flounces at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend containing some linen with short sleeves and slits in the sides of the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini top with short sleeves and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Decorative tie detail at the front and narrow elastication at the hem.
Fully lined bikini top with short sleeves and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Decorative tie detail at the front and narrow elastication at the hem.
Metal hoop earrings with text cut-outs. Diameter 4.5 cm.

Strapless, lined bandeau bikini top with a decorative ring at the front and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Concealed silicone trim at the top, side support and a metal fastener at the back.

Strapless, lined bandeau bikini top with a decorative ring at the front and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Concealed silicone trim at the top, side support and a metal fastener at the back.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a V-shaped waist, decorative ring at the front and medium coverage at the back.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a V-shaped waist, decorative ring at the front and medium coverage at the back.
Shorts in a Tencel™ modal weave with a high waist, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and detachable belt with D-rings. Pleats at the front, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Long beach kaftan in an airy weave with a V-neck front and back and high slits in the sides.
Long beach kaftan in an airy weave with a V-neck front and back and high slits in the sides.
Short twisted metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 39-47 cm.
Sandals with narrow straps and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles.
Sandals with narrow straps and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles.
Metal rings in various designs, four of which are decorated with stone-like plastic beads.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a pointelle pattern. Buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a pointelle pattern. Buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in stretch, ribbed viscose jersey with a deep neckline, decorative button band with sparkly stone buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Fitted top in stretch, ribbed viscose jersey with a deep neckline, decorative button band with sparkly stone buttons down the front and long sleeves.

Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a deep V-neck and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and decorative crossover straps at the front and sides. Medium coverage at the back.
Lined bandeau bikini top with side support and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, double shoulder straps, and a drawstring front and back. No fasteners.
Lined bandeau bikini top with side support and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, double shoulder straps, and a drawstring front and back. No fasteners.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a drawstring at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a drawstring at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a drawstring at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Scarf in an airy weave made from recycled polyester with frayed, raw edges at the sides.

Wide, high-waisted, knee-length shorts in woven fabric containing some linen. Wide waistband with buttons at the waist, a safety button inside and belt loops. Zip fly, diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and straight legs with pleats for added width.

Wide, high-waisted, knee-length shorts in woven fabric containing some linen. Wide waistband with buttons at the waist, a safety button inside and belt loops. Zip fly, diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and straight legs with pleats for added width.

Fitted shirt dress in a crisp cotton weave with a pointed collar and buttons down the front. Long, wide puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and rounded sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Top in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend. Deep V-neck at the back with lacing that ties at the back of the neck, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication, and a seam at the hem with a flared peplum.

Top in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend. Deep V-neck at the back with lacing that ties at the back of the neck, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication, and a seam at the hem with a flared peplum.
Ballet pumps in soft leather with blunt toes. Leather insoles.
Ballet pumps in soft leather with blunt toes. Leather insoles.

Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Deep V-neck with ties, buttons down the front, short puff sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester.

Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Deep V-neck with ties, buttons down the front, short puff sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined in jersey made from recycled polyester.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Boxer shorts in soft cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Ankle-length trousers in a woven viscose blend. High waist with pleats at the front and covered elastication at the back, and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, fake back pockets with a button, and tapered legs with creases.

Ankle-length trousers in a woven viscose blend. High waist with pleats at the front and covered elastication at the back, and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, fake back pockets with a button, and tapered legs with creases.
